prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Bass, Guitar, Synth Lead, Strings, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Bass, Guitar, Synth Lead, Strings, and Piano are all featured in this song, but Drums are absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Bass, Guitar, Synth Lead, Strings, and Piano, but no Drums.

Style 3:
This piece is played with Organ, Bass, Guitar, Synth Lead, Strings, and Piano, omitting Drums.
